CN.content:

| J sc |

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid "Material Name" entities:

The entities "V oc", "J sc", and "FF" are all clearly referring to material properties or characteristics, and therefore can be considered valid "Material Name" entities in the context of the given paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to "Value of material property":

The entity "FF" does not clearly refer to a material property value, as it could refer to other things such as "Factor of Safety" or "Fourier Transform", so it has been removed from the table.
